data.message: I don't like the new look. I want back the old style. we should be able to choose if we want to change it or not. I need a widder news feed, this one it's too compressed. I don't like the sidebar at all. I like the chat on the left, not on the right. it's very disturbing. in this version I always hide the sidebar because I hate it, but I can't see who is online, so i have to open the sidebar to find who I need to talk and then hide it again. it's a waiste of my time. why do I need to have my apps in 2 sections? on the left and on the side bar? it's stupid. also, I likde the option when I could see the most recent posts.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Mirabela, but appreciate the feedback. We'll take this back to our team. If there's anything else you would like to see changed, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1ei9puL  -Ryan

go back to the old time look mate ^^ ffs Google told the truth by 80% will leave Facebook during this year and next. are you doing to change and do it this way so I do not think anybody wants to use this more, please go back to the old time
or you get used to change, the world is changing, so is facebook. I learned to live with it, and trust me if I can do it anyone can do it.
please change my facebook             من فضلك غير
do not like it then your account and daring sit in ok.ru

I don't like the new FB.  The font is too big and so are the pictures.  It takes longer to scroll down through the recent news feed now.  I liked the wider view and a smaller font.  And, as for the pics/cartoons being bigger, if I wanted a closer look at them; I could do that.
That you all want to write so much..
Facebook really need your help. I will lost my job if i couldnt connect with you.!
I don't like the new look I want back the old style
